details: Added explicit handling for datetime, date, and UUID objects in _handle_json_serialization
Improved error logging with exc_info=True for full stack trace

description: Implemented robust JSON serialization for all API endpoint responses
details: Integrated _handle_json_serialization from api.utils into all API resource handlers (batch_resources.py, export_api_resources.py, protocol_designer_resources.py, mixture_analysis_resources.py, dashboard_resources.py, user_profile_resources.py)
All endpoint responses (including errors, Supabase responses, and custom objects) are now wrapped with _handle_json_serialization before returning
Replaced all jsonify({...}) and direct dict returns with jsonify(_handle_json_serialization({...})) to ensure compatibility with Flask and proper serialization of datetime, UUID, and Response objects
Prevents 'Object of type Response is not JSON serializable' and similar errors across the API
